title: Editorial: fix the issues reported by HTML Tidy
Remove the stray sentence that editing hosts outside a document cannot have a selection
Clarify that the user interaction task source is used for selectionchange event
Clarify that the direction of selection is preserved when scripts mutates its range.
Fix the definition of containsNode() method when allowPartialContainment is true.
Remove the outdated note to address the issue #128.
Align description of events with DOM suggested phrasing
Associate repo with Web Editing WG
Replace Travis CI with w3c/spec-prod GH action
Fix selectAllChildren to use child count
Editorial: Replace references to context object with this
Editorial: Align with Web IDL specification
Editorial: Remove redefinition of `editing host`. Relink to its HTML spec definition
Editorial: collapsed is now exported by DOM spec
Several syntax amendments and tiny improvements
Add a link to web-platform-tests to the top of the spec
Remove the <dfn> in Selection interface heading
Throw exception for removeRange on range that's not in selection
Throw correct exceptions from collapse/selectAllChildren on detached doctypes
Fix the spec link in README.md
Make offset and allowPartialContainment arguments optional
This spec is now part of the Web Platform WG
Draft WD for publication in October 2015
WebApps is using the 2005 Process Document (not 2014 PD)
Add link to live version of spec
Use boolean instead of bool, since the latter is not a WebIDL type
